Title: Kimi no Mana wa Rina Witch
Description:
['"Mana supply is a holy deed, so we're not embarrassed!"', '

', '
At Witch School, girls are trained to produce the best "mana supply" (sperm).', '
', '

', '
Students are arranged in boy-girl pairs to ensure a constant supply.', '
